channel.description:
Ook I Wnna Ask A question about JAVA but i dont know if this is right place to post it. it has to do with downloading java...
[font=Verdana]hi[/font][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 02:28:00 PM[/size][hr]Ook so i guees ill just ask... ok i removed some sort of Java from my computer and now i cant use my "moparscape" "limewire" "Runescape" nothing !!! and i downloaded "Runetime enviroment" but nothing still work's please help i have 2 hours b4 my mom comes home and she likes limewire so can u guys please help im willing to give some runescape $$[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 02:35:00 PM[/size][hr]please help[shadow=red,left]plz help[/shadow]

item.title: §►java~help◄§
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

YOU FUCKING IDIOT CL1CH, DIDN’T YOU SEE MY REPLIES TO YOUR TOPIC!?

CL1CH:

??? where do i put that “PATH”

[quote=“Rictoo, post:7, topic:46889”]1) Open My Computer, go to C:, Program Files, and then Java. If the only Java folder you have has the letters ‘jdk’ in it, go to step #2, if you have a folder with the letters ‘jre’ in it, then open it, go to the ‘bin’ folder and go to step #3

  1. Open the jdk folder, open ‘jre’, open ‘bin’ and do step #3

  2. Copy the link in the address bar (eg., C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0\bin), and put that into the PATH env variable[/quote]

Read full topic
